flow-definition.description: Runs with given parameters against a GitHub repository to check quality of the code. Only valid for Java projects.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: gitHubRepoUrl
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Git clone URL of the repository to run the build against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch to check code quality for

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sonarProjectKey
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Project key value of the corresponding SonarQube Project.
